title: Election 'Super Bowl' kickoff with Charlie Cook, Larry Sabato and Maria Teresa Kumar
description: Chuck talks with polling heavyweights Charlie Cook and Larry Sabato to talk about the election now that we are eight weeks out. Maria Teresa Kumar updates Chuck on Latino outreach from both campaigns.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
